code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{DrugContext}from"../context/DrugProvider";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SelectedMedsList(){var _useContext=useContext(DrugContext),selectedMeds=_useContext.selectedMeds,deleteMedList=_useContext.deleteMedList;var uniqueRxcui=[];var uniqueSelectedMeds=selectedMeds.filter(function(med){var isDuplicate=uniqueRxcui.includes(med.rxcui);if(!isDuplicate){uniqueRxcui.push(med.rxcui);return true;}return false;});console.log("unique selection: ",uniqueSelectedMeds);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:uniqueSelectedMeds.length>=1?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"selectedmeds-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"selectedmedslist-header",children:uniqueSelectedMeds.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Selected Meds List "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"(highlight and click to remove item)"})]})}),uniqueSelectedMeds.map(function(med){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"selectedmeds-layout",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"selectedmeds-item",onClick:function onClick(){return deleteMedList(med._id);},children:["Name: ",med.name," Rxcui: ",med.rxcui]})},med.rxcui);})]}):null});}export default SelectedMedsList;
